&7[Lvl 1] &6Rat
&8Combat Morph

&7Health: &a+1.25
&7Strength: &c+0.6
&7Crit Damage: &c+0.25%

&6Morph
&7&7Right-click your summoned pet to
&7morph into it!

&6CHEESE!
&7&7As a Rat, you smell &e&lCHEESE&r&7 nearby!
&7Yummy!

&6Rat's Blessing
&7&7Has a chance to grant a random
&7player &b+2.05✯ Magic Find&7 for &a20&7
&7seconds after finding a yummy piece
&7of Cheese! If the player gets a drop
&7during this buff, you have a &a20%&7
&7chance to get it too.


&eRight-click to add this pet to your 
&epet menu!

&6&lLEGENDARY&r
